doc.title: Serial
doc.plot: A dark thriller detailing the meeting of a waitress named Amy and a mysterious new guy in town who wants to cast her in the lead of his latest movie. This twisted tail of murder and deception takes a bizarre turn when Amy turns up dead after shooting several scenes with this strange character. Things really heat up when the detective investigating the murder learns that the film Amy just stared in was about a waitress being killed by a film director. The detective himself however turns out to be hiding a dark past that may hold the secret to solving the mystery of her death.
